datenschutz.changes: We reserve the right to update this privacy policy occasionally to comply with legal requirements or to implement changes to our services. The current version of the privacy policy is always available on our website.
datenschutz.contact: If you have any questions about this privacy policy or about the processing of your personal data, or if you wish to exercise your rights, please contact us: Rix Events, Tribschenstrasse 44a, 6005 Lucerne, Switzerland. Email: info{'@'}rrevents.ch.
datenschutz.cookies: Our website uses cookies to enable certain features and to make our website more user-friendly. Cookies are small text files stored on your device. You can prevent the storage of cookies by adjusting your browser settings accordingly. However, please note that in this case, not all features of our website may be fully functional.
datenschutz.dataCollection: Personal data is any information relating to an identified or identifiable individual. We collect and process your personal data only if you provide it voluntarily, for example, in the context of an inquiry via our contact form or a registration on our website. The collected data primarily includes your name, email address, phone number, and other contact information.
datenschutz.dataProtection: We employ technical and organizational security measures to protect your data from unauthorized access, manipulation, loss, or destruction. Our security measures are continuously improved in line with technological developments. All our employees and third parties involved in data processing are committed to complying with data protection regulations.
datenschutz.introduction: Protecting your personal data is important to us. This privacy policy explains how we collect, process, and use personal data when you visit our website. We process your data exclusively based on legal provisions, particularly the Swiss Data Protection Act (DSG) and, where applicable, the EU General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).
datenschutz.photoCredits: The event photos used on this website are sourced from: Employment at CH Media, 2016 – 2024, Responsibility for Events.
datenschutz.rights: You have the right to request information about your stored personal data at any time. Furthermore, you have the right to correct, block, or delete this data, provided that no legal retention obligations prevent this. You can object to the use of your personal data for advertising purposes at any time.
datenschutz.section2Title: Collection and Processing of Personal Data
datenschutz.thirdParties: Your personal data will only be disclosed to third parties if necessary for the fulfillment of the contract, if we are legally obliged to do so, or if you have expressly consented to it. Our service providers who assist us in providing our services are also obligated to comply with data protection regulations.
datenschutz.title: Privacy Policy
datenschutz.usageOfData: We use the personal data you provide to fulfill and process your inquiries, to provide our services, to improve our website, and to communicate with you. We also use your data to send you information about our services if you have consented to this.
